Instruction:
Task Description: Create a Java class that implements an ActiveMQ message producer capable of sending messages to both queues and topics.

Class Description: The JmsProducer class is responsible for establishing a connection to an ActiveMQ broker, creating both queue and topic destinations, and sending multiple text messages to each destination. It handles connection management and includes error handling for JMS operations.

Attributes:
- USERNAME: [String] - Default username for ActiveMQ connection (default: ActiveMQConnection.DEFAULT_USER)
- PASSWORD: [String] - Default password for ActiveMQ connection (default: ActiveMQConnection.DEFAULT_PASSWORD)
- BROKEURL: [String] - Default broker URL for ActiveMQ connection (default: ActiveMQConnection.DEFAULT_BROKER_URL)
- SENDNUM: [int] - Number of messages to send to each destination (default: 10)

Methods:
- run(): [void] - Main method that establishes the connection, creates destinations (queue and topic), and initiates message sending. Handles connection lifecycle and error cases.
- sendMessage(Session session, MessageProducer messageProducer, String type): [void] - Helper method that creates and sends multiple text messages with timestamps to the specified destination. 
  Parameters:
    - session: [Session] - JMS session for message creation
    - messageProducer: [MessageProducer] - Producer for sending messages
    - type: [String] - Destination type identifier ("QUEUE" or "TOPIC") for logging purposes
